article.title: SAIC to Support Information Technology Ashore for Military Sealift Command
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Science Applications International Corp., McLean, Virginia, is being awarded a potential $49.8 million contract for information technology ashore operations support services for the U.S. Navy's Military Sealift Command.Â The Military Sealift Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
